Hows everyone's day going?

I'm right now waiting for some footage/Video's for Xenoblade X to come out. I'm still sorta bummed out that Max decided just to randomly stream it and I missed out on the hype so I'm going to watch a Video of it instead and ignore his stream of it. 

But at the same time I might just be better to do the next best thing and just wait till the game comes out over here.
